credits.value: Lenovo thanks Zichuan Li (@Ri7erLi) from Indiana University Bloomington for reporting this vulnerability.

description_data.value: A buffer overflow was reported in the Update_WMI module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

description.value: CWE-120: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input

supportingMedia.value: Update system firmware to the version (or newer) indicated for your model in the advisory: https://support.lenovo.com/us/en/product_security/LEN-141775

solution.value: Update system firmware to the version (or newer) indicated for your model in the advisory:  https://support.lenovo.com/us/en/product_security/LEN-141775

description_data.value: A buffer overflow was reported in the Update_WMI module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.
